title: London College of Printing
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822235750/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822235750/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Education) : London College of Printing**

**London College of Printing** or LCP. Now known as the [London College of Communication](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822235750/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20College%20of%20Communication) (LCC). Part of the [University of the Arts London](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822235750/http:/typophile.com/wiki/University%20of%20the%20Arts%20London).
author: higashi
